Title: Captain Alatriste: The Spanish Musketeer
Genre: Adventure, Drama, History, Romance, Thriller, War
Writer: Arturo Pérez-Reverte (novels), Agustín Díaz Yanes, Carlota Pérez-Reverte (characters)
Actors: Viggo Mortensen, Elena Anaya, Unax Ugalde, Eduard Fernández
Plot: Viggo Mortensen plays the Spanish soldier-turned-mercenary Captain Alatriste, a heroic figure from the country's 17th century imperial wars.
